warezcdn.name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru
warezcdn.title: Yahari ore no seishun rabukome wa machigatteiru.

imdb.title: Yahari ore no seishun rabukome wa machigatteiru.
imdb.plot: About an antisocial high school student named Hikigaya Hachiman with a distorted view on life and no friends or girlfriend. His life change when he was forced to enter the "Volunteer Service Club" by his teacher.

episodes.title: In Due Time, the Seasons Change and the Snow Melts
episodes.plot: After Yukino announced that she was ready to name her request to the Service Club, a long silence followed - but that silence is about to broken.

episodes.title: That Key Was Never Handled Until Today
episodes.plot: Isshiki approaches the Service Club with and interesting proposition, but Yukino would like to handle this time-sensitive challenge on her own.

episodes.title: Iroha Isshiki is the Strongest Junior, as Expected
episodes.plot: What is a prom, exactly? Yukino and Iroha have a plan to show both Hachiman and the student body the answer to that question - with Yui's help, of course.

episodes.title: By Chance, Yui Yuigahama Thinks of the Future
episodes.plot: The Student Council's prom plans sour after a shocking school policy reversal - and to make matters worse, an unexpectedly familiar messenger delivers the bad news.

episodes.title: Shizuka Hiratsuka Deeply Longs for the Days Past
episodes.plot: Hachiman is determine to help bring the prom to life, but Yukino isn't keen on accepting his help. Luckily Hachiman has a plan - one that uniquely involves the Service Club.

episodes.title: Once again, Hachiman Hikigaya Makes a Speech
episodes.plot: First step in Hachiman's plan? Rally the troops. Together they'll create a prom proposal so awful, the PTO will have no choice but to choose Yukino's instead.

episodes.title: Until the End, Yui Yuigahama Will Continue Watching Over Them
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Wishing That, at the Very Least, I Don't Make Any More Mistakes
episodes.plot: Pushing a dummy event like a second prom is a great idea on Hachiman's part, but the tactic isn't foolproof against Yukino's mother. Good thing he has an ace up his sleeve.

episodes.title: A Whiff of that Fragrance Will Always Bring Memories of that Season
episodes.plot: Hachiman has a new objective: granting Yui's wish. First step? Help her bake something delicious for Komachi, and perhaps include Yui's mom's "secret ingredient."

episodes.title: Gallantly, Shizuka Hiratsuka Moves Forward
episodes.plot: Will prom succeed without a hitch? Or is the real trouble lying in wait once prom comes to an end?

episodes.title: Only a Heated Touch Truly Conveys the Sentiment
episodes.plot: Now that the club has disbanded, they'll continue to drift even further apart - but before they do, Yui has one final wish to make.

episodes.title: My Teen Romantic Comedy is Wrong, As I Expected.
episodes.plot: One final hurdle, and the prom situation will finally be over - but will Hachiman's search for something genuine be so easily resolved?

episodes.title: Nobody Knows Why They Came to the Service Club
episodes.plot: The Service Club's new task is to help Tobe find a way to confess his true feelings to Ebina, but she's got a different agenda in mind, and it includes Hachiman.

episodes.title: His and Her Confessions Will Reach No One
episodes.plot: The field trip in Kyoto continues, with the Service Club trying their best to help solve their problems. Later, Hachiman makes a surprising realization.

episodes.title: Quietly, Yukinoshita Yukino Makes a Decision
episodes.plot: The tension between Yukino and Hachiman is thick enough to cut with a knife. Meanwhile, Kaker is planning something for Hina.

episodes.title: And Then, Yuigahama Yui Makes a Declaration
episodes.plot: Hachiman ends up in an awkward situation with Orimoto, while still searching for the solution to the student election prank. However, a resolution is closer than he thinks.

episodes.title: The Scent of Tea Doesn't Fill That Room Anymore
episodes.plot: Hachiman has yet to figure out how to fix the student council president election problem. But a discussion with his sister finally gives him the ability to take action.

episodes.title: Without Incident, the Congress Dances, But Does Not Progress
episodes.plot: After the student council election, Hachiman has his reservations as to whether he made the right choice as the new president struggles with her first event.

episodes.title: Yet, That Room Continues to Play Out the Endless Days
episodes.plot: Iroha's first event as president isn't going well. All of the people on the partnering student council just want to look smart, but can't actually make decisions.

episodes.title: But Still, Hikigaya Hachiman Is...
episodes.plot: After Hachiman and Yukino's conversation, Hachiman is left contemplating the faults in his thinking. Ms. Hiratsuka offers him a car ride and her advice on the matter.

episodes.title: And, Yukinoshita Yukino Is...
episodes.plot: Ms. Hiratsuka gives the trio and Iroha tickets a theme park and tells them to discover what Christmas really means.

episodes.title: The Thing That the Light in Each of Their Hands Shines On
episodes.plot: It will take all three members of the Service Club to fix the disastrous Christmas event. After, Yui and Hachiman head out to pick a present for Yukino's birthday.

episodes.title: Hayama Hayato Always Responds to Everyone's Expectations
episodes.plot: While the group attempts to figure out what their respective future plans are, a rumor is sparked regarding Yukino and Hayama that makes the whole school curious.

episodes.title: Still, the Thing He Seeks Is Out of Reach, and He Continues to Mistake What's Real
episodes.plot: With the approach of Valentine's Day, the Service Club is overwhelmed with requests regarding chocolate. In an attempt to solve the issue, Hachiman concocts a sweet plan.

episodes.title: Spring, Bound Beneath the Thick Snow, Begins to Sprout
episodes.plot: An awkward visit from Yukino's sister causes Yukino to spend the night at Yui's. But when only Yui seems able to make up her mind, the Service Club may never be the same.

episodes.title: OVA 2: Kitto, onnanoko wa osatou to spice to suteki na nanika de dekiteiru
episodes.plot: Iroha Isshiki takes Hachiman on a date to aid her in coming up with date ideas for her and Hayato.

episodes.title: KÃ´shite karera no machigatta seishun ga hajimaru
episodes.plot: Hachiman Hikigaya is a pessimistic and pragmatic loner who has the ideal that "youth" is wasted on those who deceive themselves by its innocent bliss. He is forced by his language teacher Shizuka Hiratsuka to join the school's Service Club in order to improve his social nature. Hachiman meets the club's only other member, Yukino Yukinoshita and immediately enters a debate regarding the flaws of their respective personalities since Yukino believes in telling people the truth regardless of how harsh it may seem. The fun continues with the introduction of Yui Yuigahama ...

episodes.title: Kitto, dareshimo hitoshi nami ni nayami o kakaeteiru
episodes.plot: Zaimokuza Yoshiteru was once Hikigaya's gym partner. He is also dramatically reliving one of his historical fantasies, so what happens when he shows up at the club with a draft of his novel, ready to be reviewed?

episodes.title: Tamani rabu kome no kami-sama wa Ã® koto o suru
episodes.plot: As Hachiman continues to hone his skills in the art of being left alone, another student comes to him with a new request for the club.

episodes.title: Tsumari, kare wa tomodachi ga sukunai.
episodes.plot: Hachiman has a small crisis concerning little sisters and what they mean. Afterward he receives a mysterious text, outlining the club's next student request.

episodes.title: Mata shite mo, kare wa moto kita michi e hikikaesu.
episodes.plot: Hachiman's sister is asked for advice from her classmates. Apparently she has been acting strange lately, and the Service Club intends to find out why.

episodes.title: YÃ´yaku kare to kanojo no hajimari ga owaru.
episodes.plot: Shizuka announces that Hachiman and Yui must go on a recruitment drive to find more members, and they know exactly who to target.

episodes.title: Tomoare, natsuyasuminanoni yasumenai no wa nanikaokashÃ®
episodes.plot: Hachiman tries his best to relax during Summer break but constant texts from Shizuka concerning the Service Club activities prevents him from doing so.

episodes.title: Izure karera kanojora wa shinjitsu o shiru
episodes.plot: Shizuka readies a bonfire and a "test of courage." Later, Yui recognizes the limo that hit Hachiman.

episodes.title: Mitabi, kare wa moto kita michi e hikikaesu
episodes.plot: Yui invites Hachiman and Komachi to the annual summer fireworks festival. The pair run into Haruno, who uses the opportunity to explain a little of the complicated relationship between herself and Yukino.

episodes.title: Izentoshite karera no kyori wa kawarazu ni, matsuri wa mÃ´sugu kÃ¢nibaru
episodes.plot: Yui notices a rift forming between Hachiman and Yukino. Hachiman is nominated to serve on the committee for the school's upcoming cultural festival.

episodes.title: Soshite, sorezore no butai no maku ga agari, matsuri wa saikÃ´ ni fesutiba tte iru
episodes.plot: Hachiman and Yui check on Yukino. Later, Hachiman shakes things up with the committee when he decides to alter their mindset.

episodes.title: KÃ´shite, kare to kanojo to kanojo no seishun wa machigai tsudzukeru
episodes.plot: Soubu High's Cultural Festival continues and Hachiman is stuck carrying out his duty as a committee member by documenting the day's events on film.

episodes.title: Dakara, karera no matsuri wa owaranai
episodes.plot: A mysterious request to helm the upcoming sports festival arrives. The group must band together to figure out a way to pull it off.

episodes.title: OVA: Kochira toshite mo karera kanojora no yukusue ni sachiÃ´karan koto o negawazaru o enai
episodes.plot: Hiratsuka-sensei asks the volunteer club to help her contribute to a local magazine themed around marriage. Since none of them, knows anything about the subject, they ask someone who has experience "taking care of useless deadweight".
